data.current_description: Get the supported barcode types for encoding / image generation.
data.summary_suggestion: List supported barcode types for encoding
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all barcode types supported by the encoding service for barcode image generation. Returns an array of supported barcode format identifiers and their descriptions. Use this operation to determine which barcode types can be used with the encode operation.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is minimal and lacks context about the response format and use case. Enhanced version clarifies that this is a reference operation to support the encode operation, explains the response structure, and helps AI agents understand when to call this operation.

message: Operation 'get_/barcode/encode' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain the 5 parameters or what the response contains. Enhanced version clarifies input requirements (barcode data, type selection), mentions optional parameters, specifies the image output, and references the types endpoint for valid formats. This helps AI agents understand parameter dependencies and when to use this operation.

data.current_description: Get a Bar Code image for the given barcode number
data.summary_suggestion: Generate barcode image from barcode number
data.description_suggestion: Generates a barcode image for the provided barcode number and format type. Accepts parameters including the barcode number/data, barcode type (format), and optional image formatting parameters (size, resolution, etc.). Returns a barcode image in the requested format. Requires valid barcode data and a supported barcode type from the encode/types endpoint.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain the 5 parameters or what the response contains. Enhanced version clarifies input requirements (barcode data, type selection), mentions optional parameters, specifies the image output, and references the types endpoint for valid formats. This helps AI agents understand parameter dependencies and when to use this operation.

message: Operation 'get_/barcode/decode/types' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context. Missing summary. Description lacks context about response format and relationship to the decode operation. Enhanced version clarifies this is a reference operation, explains the response structure, and helps AI agents understand it should be called before attempting to decode unknown barcode types.

data.current_description: Get the supported barcode types for the decoding process.
data.summary_suggestion: List supported barcode types for decoding
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all barcode types supported by the decoding service for barcode image analysis. Returns an array of supported barcode format identifiers and their descriptions. Use this operation to determine which barcode types can be recognized and decoded by the decode operation.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks context about response format and relationship to the decode operation. Enhanced version clarifies this is a reference operation, explains the response structure, and helps AI agents understand it should be called before attempting to decode unknown barcode types.

message: Operation 'post_/barcode/decode' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Missing summary and contains typo ('cotents' should be 'contents'). Description is vague about input format (image file vs data), doesn't explain optional parameters, and lacks clarity on error handling. Enhanced version specifies the POST request body format, explains optional type parameter, clarifies success/failure responses, and references the types endpoint. This improves AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Decode a Barcode image and return the cotents if successful
data.summary_suggestion: Decode barcode image to extract data
data.description_suggestion: Decodes a barcode image and extracts the encoded data. Accepts a barcode image file or image data as input, optionally specifying the expected barcode type to improve accuracy. Returns the decoded barcode data/number on success. If decoding fails or the barcode type is not recognized, returns an error response. Supports barcode types listed in the decode/types endpoint.
data.reasoning: Missing summary and contains typo ('cotents' should be 'contents'). Description is vague about input format (image file vs data), doesn't explain optional parameters, and lacks clarity on error handling. Enhanced version specifies the POST request body format, explains optional type parameter, clarifies success/failure responses, and references the types endpoint. This improves AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.
